verses.roman:
rātre uṭhi' ekelā calilā palāñā
dūra haite pitā tāṅre ānila dhariyā

synonyms: rātre—at night; uṭhi'-getting up; ekelā—alone; calilā—left; palāñā—running away; dūra haite—from a distant place; pitā—his father; tāṅre—him; ānila—brought back; dhariyā—catching.
translation: He got up alone one night and left, but his father caught him in a distant place and brought him back.
